mapper.select:
select frr.*,ps.project_name from feasibility_research_report frr, project_store ps where frr.del_flag=0 and frr.project_id=ps.id and ps.del_flag=0 and frr.approve=1
and ps.project_name like concat('%',#{projectName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%')
order by frr.id desc
